name: Get Task Run Stats
description: Calculate aggregate statistics for all runs of a task. Returns total runs, success rate, average duration, and total cost.

agent_name.description: Name of the agent that executes the task

task_id.description: ID of the task to get statistics for

examples.scenario: Get statistics for lesson plan generation task
examples.expected_result: Returns stats: { total_runs: 50, successful_runs: 48, failed_runs: 2, success_rate: 96, avg_duration_ms: 15000, total_cost: 2.50 }
